item.title: Pathtracer Devlog
item.description: This post is a devlog for my pathtracer-playground project. Follow along to see the progress, starting from scratch by opening a simple window. Camera and UI interaction 2023-11-07 Commit: 1593e8a In order to work with arbitrary 3d models, camera positions and parameters should not be hard-coded. To kickstart scene interaction, two things are implemented: A “fly camera”, which allows you to move around and pan the scene around using the mouse.
